content.heading: <bdi> Tag
paragraphs: The <bdi> tag isolates text with different directionality.

content.heading: Definition and Usage
paragraphs: Useful for user-generated content with unknown text direction.

content.heading: Browser Support
paragraphs: Supported by Chrome 16.0, Edge 79.0, Firefox 10.0, Opera 15.0. Not supported by Safari.
